name: KREW EATS
description:
Play the Official KREW Mobile Game! Join Rainbow, Gold, Funneh, Lunar, and Draco for an epic eating adventure. Play as KREW, collect super cute pets, and see how far you can EAT!

• YOU & KREW! | Play as Rainbow, Gold, Funneh, Lunar, and Draco! Who’ll eat best?
• OM NOM NOM | Can you and KREW eat ALL the foods at ALL the locations?
• SOOO CUTE | Collect 25+ PETS to help you eat even more!
• LOOKIN’ GOOD | Unlock your style! Mix and match outfits and look good eating.

Join KREW and play KREW EATS NOW!
Hurry, Draco’s getting hungry…

____

Find KREW on YouTube: ItsFunneh, PaintingRainbows, GoldenGlare, Lunar Eclispe, DraconiteDragon.
